item.title: LA fires live updates: Palisades investigators have gathered 150 leads, official says
item.description: At least 25 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: Middle East live updates: IDF will stay in Gaza's Philadelphi corridor, source says
item.description: The Israel Defense Forces continues its intense airstrike and ground campaigns in Gaza with ceasefire talks ending with success in Qatar.

item.title: American accused of assaulting a Pa. student being extradited to US, prosecutors say
item.description: French Appeal Court prosecutors say an American man accused of sexually assaulting a Pennsylvania college student in 2013 is being extradited to the U...

item.title: 3 Stanley Cup rings stolen from home of Pittsburgh Penguins star Evgeni Malkin
item.description: Three Stanley Cup championship rings have been stolen from Pittsburgh Penguins forward Evgeni Malkin's home in another theft from a high-profile profe...

item.title: 83-year-old woman's lottery winnings stolen as man attacks her in store parking lot
